column4: does anyone know how to load a script (self written) on startup?
i'm looking at it right now... should I just add my code at the end of whatever is already there?
there is no `exit 0` in the file
how do i pastebin... what is that? (sorry i'm pretty new)
err, you can't be looking at /etc/rc.local
not so sure what you mean
that file that you pastebinned references /etc/rc.local in a shell command, so checking for the existence of itself is meaningless...
you need to look at /etc/rc.local  (the file)
i see... how do I edit that? when i open it with gedit thats not the code i see
